showLabel.description: Show or hide the label of selected language. Default `true`

disabled.description: Disable or enable the component. Default `false`

showOptionLabel.description: Show or hide labels in option list. Default `true`

showArrow.description: Show or hide arrow expand. Default `true`

placeholder.description: Placeholder to show when not selected language. Default `"Language"`

languages.description: Array of languages to show, an array with countries codes. Default `"[]"`, see example section. The complete list of countries can be found https://github.com/ekwonye-richard/react-flags-select/blob/master/src/countries.js

onSelect.description: Called when language selection change. Params `{language}`
